Package goal.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observable<OBS extends Observer<SRC,OBJ>,SRC,OBJ>
    generic interface for observable functionality.
    Observer<SRC,OBJ>
    Observer of events of type OBJ coming from SRC,
    Visitable
    Interface for the object structure part.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BracketedOptions
    Container for options (or settings).
    DefaultObservable<OBS extends Observer<SRC,OBJ>,SRC,OBJ>
    Implements generic observable functionality.
    ImportCommand
    Wrapper for the data from an #import-command.
    IterableFilter<T,U>
    Filters an iteration of Ts, and converts them into Us if it is decided that they should be in the iteration.
    IterableStitcher<T>
    An Iterable that will 'stitch' an iteration of iterations.

    Using yield return as an indicator what the next() method of the IterableStitcher.iterator() should return, the following pseudo-code describes the working of this class:

      for (Iterable<? extends T> subIter : allIters)
        for (T value : subIter)
          yield return value;
    Listenable<ListenerType,EventType>
    Abstract class to support listenable objects
    MapUtils
    Simple util for some map support functions.
    Statistics
    Implements simple statistic functionality.
    Visitor
    Base class of the Visitor pattern.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BracketedOptions.KEYS
    All keys recognized by GOAL.
    Extension
    Extensions of files recognized by GOAL.
